mapper.select: select g.goods_no,name,filePath || '/' || imgPath mainImg,calorie,allergy,origin,price from Goods g inner join ( select gc.goods_no,gc.sort from goods_category gc where categoryType_no = ( select categoryType_no from ( select rownum rn,s1.* from ( select categoryType_no from category_Type where menuType_no = #{menuType_no} order by menuType_no ) s1 ) s2 where s2.rn = (#{cateRowNum}-1) ) ) s1 on g.goods_no = s1.goods_no inner join goods_Detail gd on g.main_no = gd.goodsdetail_no order by s1.sort

select g.goods_no,g.name,filePath || '/' || imgPath mainImg,calorie,allergy,origin,price from goods_Detail gd inner join ( select s1.* from ( select goodsDetail_no,count(goodsDetail_no) as cnt from orders o group by goodsDetail_no ) s1 where rownum <= 15 ) s2 on gd.goodsDetail_no = s2.goodsDetail_no inner join goods g on gd.goods_no = g.goods_no inner join goods_Category gc on g.goods_no = gc.goods_no inner join category_Type ct on gc.categoryType_no = ct.categoryType_no where ct.menuType_no = #{no} order by cnt desc,ct.categoryType_no asc
